name: Babylon Tower (gurido)
description:
>Bring divided people together< 

Based on the story of Babylon, humans were separated when building the tower. It takes wisdom, patience, and strength to solve the puzzle and bring humanity together again. 

>How to Play< 

Use weight to control the movement of the platform. Click on objects, humans and monsters to bring them onto the platform or drop them on current level. Click on Medkit and Key to collect and use. 

>GMTK 2021 Submission< 

The game was created during the 2021 GMTK period from scratch. We came up with the idea, made all the codes and designed all graphic support within the 48 hours window. （Right now the current version only available until the first boss fight, it will be updated soon) Please let us know what you think about our game.

Designer: CheezyX
